title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek Black! Brew your favorite coffee in under a minute with this efficient and convenient coffee maker. With brew sizes of 6, 8, and 10 ounces, you can customize your coffee to suit your taste.

The 36-ounce removable water reservoir makes refilling a breeze, while the smart start feature ensures your coffee is ready when you are. The button controls make operation simple and user-friendly. This energy-efficient coffee maker automatically shuts off after 2 hours, saving you energy and providing peace of mind.

The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches in height and holds a full accidental brew. Need hot water for tea or instant soup? This coffee maker can dispense hot water too! Compatible with K-Cup pods, this machine is versatile and convenient for all your coffee needs.

Don't miss out on the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker - the perfect addition to any kitchen. Grab yours today and enjoy a perfect cup of coffee every time! (Packaging may vary)

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black! Enjoy your favorite coffee in just under a minute with brew sizes of 6, 8, or 10 ounces. The 36 oz removable water reservoir makes refilling a breeze, while the smart start feature ensures your coffee is ready when you are. With button controls and energy-efficient auto-off function after 2 hours, this coffee maker is convenient and easy to use. The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches and even holds a full accidental brew. Plus, enjoy the option to dispense hot water for tea or other beverages. Compatible with K-Cup pods and the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, this coffee maker is versatile and perfect for any coffee lover. Get your morning started right with the Keurig K-Compact! (Packaging may vary)
